basic.floral_language:
Hemerocallis fulva 
Floriography: warm, sincere, love
Also called No Worry Grass in Chinese, Mothers' flower in China
Orange Daylily is herb plant, small with cluster of long, lanceolate leaves. Flowers are of bright, warm colors, such as red and orange. Usually used for decoration indoor and outdoor. 
Orange Daylily prefers median light and half shade. Flowering in May through July, lasting 2-3 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period May-July, viewing period 2-3 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, resistant to half shade
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
